summary.para: Retrieves a collection of fonts, grouped into families.

param.name: includeDownloadableFonts
param.para: true if you want to include downloadable fonts. false if you only want locally installed fonts.

param.name: fontFamilyModel
param.para: How to group families in the collection.

param.name: fontCollection
param.para: The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font collection object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: Retrieves the set of system fonts.

param.name: includeDownloadableFonts
param.para: true if you want to include downloadable fonts. false if you only want locally installed fonts.

param.name: fontSet
param.para: The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to the font set object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: This interface represents a factory object from which all DirectWrite objects are created. IDWriteFactory7 adds new facilities for working with system fonts.
